id: scenario-value-scanner-idd-community-scenarios-community-supporting other idd community members as peer
title: Supporting other IDD community members as peer
description: Supporting other IDD community members as peer
content:
Scenario: Supporting other IDD community members as peer
    Given Jordan has learned strategies for various daily challenges
    And a newer group home resident is struggling with similar issues
    When Jordan offers peer support
    Then Jordan shares what has helped them
    And the new resident benefits from Jordan's lived experience wisdom
    And Jordan's peer support is recognized as valuable care work
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for peer support contribution
    And Jordan experiences being a care provider and mentor
    And IDD peer support is recognized as essential care infrastructure
